1. User changes currency in transaction cell dropdown
2. Change event fires on .currency-field element

5. Transaction is updated in AppState.transactions
6. Change is saved to localStorage
7. Transaction summary is updated with new currency data
8. Currency filter dropdown options are refreshed
9. Charts are updated with new currency data
